title: Best Apple Salad
directions: In a medium bowl, combine the apples, bell pepper, red onion and kidney beans. In a separate bowl, whisk together the vinegar, honey, mustard and pepper. Pour over the salad, and stir gently to coat.
ingredients: 2 medium sweet apples, cored and cubed
1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
